properties.entry: SELECT MEM_NO , MEM_ID , MEM_PWD , MEM_NAME , EMAIL , NICKNAME , BIRTHDAY , PHONE , ENROLL_DATE , STATUS , AGREE_YN , GENDER FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = ? AND MEM_PWD = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
INSERT INTO MEMBER ( MEM_NO , MEM_ID , MEM_PWD , MEM_NAME , EMAIL , NICKNAME , PHONE , GENDER , AGREE_YN ) VALUES ( SEQ_MEM.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
